name: EZ-done File Manager
author: MS / Marius Schmitz / FD Frank Duran

sections.description:
The EZ-done File Manager is a simple and effective tool to manage files for your web pages. Upload your files and create folders and directories in your assets folder, exactly how you intend to use them. Upload, delete and move files from one location to another.

The free version of EZ-done File Manager

  • Tree of folders: The well known directory structure to create and manage your files and folders
  • Create folders: Admin can create folders.
  • Upload files: Your files will be uploaded as they are.
  • Organize folders and files: Organize your files at the push of a button.

Get lifetime updates for your EZ-done File Manager

  • Tree of folders: The well known directory structure to create and manage your files and folders
  • Create folders: Admin can create folders.
  • Upload files: Your files will be uploaded as they are.
  • Organize folders and files: Organize your files at the push of a button.
  • Lifetime update service: Added functionalities for better.
  • Stay safe: Security updates
  • Developing your File Manager: New features to enhance your pleasure working with your EZ-done File Manager.

Create killer content with EZ-done.

Keep your pictures and videos in perfect shape

To get Premium support go to https://ez-done.com/q-and-a/

Read more our other products https://ez-done.com

Follow EZ-done.com on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/EZ-done-BV

How to use

  1. First Activate Plugin.
  2. Then Click on ” EZ-done File Manager ” menu. Then do with files what you want to do.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the EZ—done-file-manager folder to the directory /wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Support

  • If any problem occurs, please contact us at https://ez-done.com/q-and-a/
sections.changelog:
Latest

  • fix frozen buttons after upload.

3.1.1

  • fix ajax stop.

3.1.1

  • basic release

Minimum requirements for File Manager

  • WordPress 4.+
  • PHP 5.x
  • PHP 7.x compatible
  • MySQL 5.x

If any problem occurs, please contact us at https://ez-done.com/q-and-a/.

sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the EZ—done-file-manager folder to the directory /wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Support

  • If any problem occurs, please contact us at https://ez-done.com/q-and-a/

short_description: Upload your files to the EZ-done File Manager and categorize them to your liking.

screenshots.caption: You will get a fullscreen view of the EZ-done File Manager
This is your folder to work in.
Files are also distinguished by colored labels and icons.
Which ever method of uploading has your preference.
To obtain the clearest overview of your files.
When working on a page, even if chosen ‘Add media’ you will have the opportunity to choose your EZ-done File Manager.
Always a choice to work with your favorite tool, your own EZ-done File Manager
